original_text: Then Amos answered Amaziah, ‘My job was not as a prophet. My father never did that work. My job was to work as a shepherd. I also took care of fig trees.
korean_text: 아모스가 아마샤에게 대답하여 이르되 나는 선지자가 아니며 선지자의 아들도 아니라 나는 목자요 뽕나무를 재배하는 자로서

sentences.original_text: My job was not as a prophet
My father never did that work
sentences.korean_translation: 제 아버지는 그 일을 한 적이 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: My job was to work as a shepherd
I also took care of fig trees
